Reviews.Title: Love this device but.........!
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I love this device but I need 64 GB  of internal storage.  I know they make a 64 gb model but cannot find one anywhere.  Not even one on Amazon.  Yes, I know it has an SD card but that is not enough.  I will need it for production and have to have the storage for it to be a serious device.  I am dropping rating to 3 because it is useless  to me with 32GB
